message: Hi Bob, I have a fantastic product that I think you'd be very interested in. I'm offering it to you for $200.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Bob, I appreciate your interest!  While $120 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to come down to $175. Let's see if we can find common ground.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $175 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay up to $150 for the product. Can you meet me in the middle?
